ScriptCommand.Name: next
ScriptCommand.Description: Display a next button in the npc dialog to clear all messages

ScriptCommand.Name: close
ScriptCommand.Description: Display a close button in the npc dialog to close it

ScriptCommand.Name: close2
ScriptCommand.Description: Display a close button in the npc dialog to close it.\nInstead of close command, the script wont be closed and has to be closed by the script command end.

ScriptCommand.Name: end
ScriptCommand.Description: Ends the script execution of the current npc. An npc dialog, if present wont be closed.

ScriptCommand.Name: mes
ScriptCommand.Description: Prints the message in an npc window

ScriptCommand.Name: select
ScriptCommand.Description: Prints a menu based on the given arguments and returned the index of the selected option, start by 1.

ScriptCommand.Name: menu
ScriptCommand.Description: Prints a menu based on the given arguments and jumps to the given label, if present

ScriptCommandArgument.Name: Menu label 1
ScriptCommandArgument.Description: The 1st label in the menu, activated after selecting Option 1

ScriptCommandArgument.Name: Menu label 2
ScriptCommandArgument.Description: The 2nd label in the menu, activated after selecting Option 2

ScriptCommandArgument.Name: function name
ScriptCommandArgument.Description: The script function name to be called

ScriptCommandArgument.Name: Function parameter 1
ScriptCommandArgument.Description: The first parameter passed to the called function

ScriptCommandArgument.Name: Function parameter 2
ScriptCommandArgument.Description: The second parameter passed to the called function

ScriptCommand.Name: callsub
ScriptCommand.Description: Works like goto and jumps to the given label in the current npc. Unlink goto, the Script continues after a "return" after this callsub.

ScriptCommandArgument.Name: Function parameter 1
ScriptCommandArgument.Description: The first parameter passed to the triggered label

ScriptCommandArgument.Name: Function parameter 2
ScriptCommandArgument.Description: The second parameter passed to the triggered label
